Package org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business.base.SuperService<UserEntity,UserDto,UserRepository,UserMapper>
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service @Transactional public class UserService extends SuperService<UserEntity,UserDto,UserRepository,UserMapper> implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service providing business logic and CRUD operations for users. Extends the generic SuperService for UserEntity and UserDto. Implements UserDetailsService for Spring Security integration.

      Returns:
      the saved or updated UserDto

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the default admin user at application startup. Throws a RuntimeException if the admin user cannot be saved.
